prompts.initial_prompt:
Please analyze this image and create an icon-style illustration in a children's storybook aesthetic.

FORMAT: Single centered icon on plain white background
COMPOSITION: Object-focused, centered, filling 80% of the frame
BACKGROUND: Pure white or very light cream - NO decorative elements, NO scene elements
STYLE: Hand-drawn crayon icon with soft textures
TECHNIQUE: Textured crayon strokes with visible paper grain, like a hand-drawn icon
COLOR PALETTE: Warm, muted pastels - soft oranges, gentle yellows, cozy browns, sky blues, sage greens
EDGES: Clear, well-defined edges suitable for background removal
SHAPES: Simple, rounded forms with slightly imperfect hand-drawn lines

Key requirements:
- Keep the object as the ONLY element (no hearts, stars, or decorative additions)
- Maintain icon-like simplicity and clarity
- Ensure the object has clear boundaries for easy extraction
- Center the object with adequate white space around it
- Think of it as a storybook icon or stamp illustration

Avoid: Backgrounds, scenes, multiple objects, decorative elements, shadows that extend beyond the object

The result should be a single, centered, icon-style object that can be easily extracted from its background.
